amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 118-280 to require a report on the number of specified aliens provided housing on federal lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
